languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy or perform a critical hit, they gain +2 MP at their next turn.
Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical hit, they gain +2 movement points on their next turn.

Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo o asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico, gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mata a un enemigo o asesta un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} crítico, gana +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者击杀敌人或造成暴击时，下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}都会额外获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者击杀敌人或造成暴击时，下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}都会额外获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi ou inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique, il bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} lors de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi ou inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} critique, il bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind tötet oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} erzielt, erhält er zu Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger einen Feind tötet oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}kritischen Treffer{/g} landet, erlangt er +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} bei Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が敵を殺害またはクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を記録した場合、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}+2を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が敵を殺害またはクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}を記録した場合、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} +2を獲得する。

languages.text: Убив противника или совершив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}, персонаж получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Убив противника или совершив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}, персонаж получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

Убив противника или совершив {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическое попадание{/g}, персонаж получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde veya kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g} yaptığında bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunda{/g} +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanı{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy or scores a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, they gain +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
